usage: arcyd instaweb [-h] [--port PORT] --report-file REPORTFILE
                      [--reset-file NAME] [--pause-file NAME] --repo-file-dir
                      REPOFILEDIR

Start a local webserver to report the status of an arcyd instance.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --port PORT           port to serve pages on
  --report-file REPORTFILE
                        path to the arcyd report file to render
  --reset-file NAME     filename to watch for, will reset operations if the
                        file is detected and remove the file.
  --pause-file NAME     filename to watch for, will pause operations while the
                        file is detected.
  --repo-file-dir REPOFILEDIR
                        path to the repo files to render
